text: Behind the Footlights () is a 1956 Soviet comedy drama film directed by Konstantin Yudin. == Plot == The film tells about an elderly actor and his beautiful and gifted daughter, who dreams of becoming an actress and playing in the theater. == Cast == * Vasili Merkuryev as Lev Gurych Sinichkin (as V.
